sentences.sentence: All traitorous persons and cliques came to no good end.
sentences.translation: 所有的叛徒及叛徒集团都没好下场。

sentences.sentence: They were two of the "traitorous eight," a group that left Shockley Semiconductor Laboratory to begin their own rival company.
sentences.translation: 是“叛将8君子”(世人对离开肖克利半导体实验室，开创公司与老东家竞争的8个人的称呼)中的两位。
